mapper.select: select tb_ep_sale_notice.id, tb_ep_sale_notice.add_date from tb_ep_sale_notice where tb_ep_sale_notice.is_del=0 and tb_ep_sale_notice.consumer_id = #{consumerId}
select tb_ep_sale_notice.id, tb_ep_sale_notice.phone from tb_ep_sale_notice where tb_ep_sale_notice.is_del=0 and tb_ep_sale_notice.is_notice=1 and tb_ep_sale_notice.epSale_id = #{epSaleId}

select ep.id as epSaleId, ep.title from tb_ep_sale ep where ep.is_del=0 and ep.id in( select tb_goods.g_active from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1) and ep.start_time=now()

select tb_ep_sale_notice.id, tb_ep_sale_notice.add_date from tb_ep_sale_notice where tb_ep_sale_notice.is_del=0 and tb_ep_sale_notice.epSale_id = #{epSaleId} and tb_ep_sale_notice.consumer_id = #{consumerId}

select tb_ep_sale_notice.id, tb_ep_sale_notice.add_date, tb_ep_sale_notice.epSale_id as epSaleId, tb_goods.g_id as gId, tb_ep_sale_notice.phone from tb_ep_sale_notice inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_active=tb_ep_sale_notice.epSale_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_ep_sale_notice.is_del=0 and tb_ep_sale_notice.is_notice=1 and tb_goods.g_id = #{gId} and tb_ep_sale_notice.consumer_id = #{consumerId}
mapper.update: update tb_ep_sale_notice t set t.epSale_id=#{epSaleId} , t.phone=#{phone} , t.update_date=#{updateDate}, t.consumer_id=#{consumerId}, t.add_ip=#{addIp}, t.is_notice=#{isNotice} where t.is_del=0 and t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_ep_sale_notice( id, epSale_id, phone, add_date, update_date, consumer_id, add_ip, is_notice, is_del, remark ) values
( #{EPSaleNotice.id}, #{EPSaleNotice.epSaleId}, #{EPSaleNotice.phone}, #{EPSaleNotice.addDate}, #{EPSaleNotice.updateDate}, #{EPSaleNotice.consumerId}, #{EPSaleNotice.addIp}, #{EPSaleNotice.isNotice}, #{EPSaleNotice.isDel}, #{EPSaleNotice.remark} )
